2:Tb36,{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Recipe","name":"Budín de Pan","description":"Argentina's beloved bread pudding — a custardy, caramel-topped dessert that transforms stale bread into pure comfort. Every Argentine grandmother has her own version, and it's the ultimate waste-nothing recipe.","image":"https://expatsargentina.com/images/recipes/budin-de-pan.webp","author":{"@type":"Organization","name":"Expats Argentina"},"datePublished":"2025-01-01","prepTime":"PT20M","cookTime":"PT50M","totalTime":"PT70M","recipeYield":"8 servings","recipeCategory":"dessert","recipeCuisine":"Argentine","keywords":"budin de pan recipe, argentine bread pudding, budin de pan argentino, caramel bread pudding, dulce de leche bread pudding","nutrition":{"@type":"NutritionInformation","calories":"340 calories","proteinContent":"10g","carbohydrateContent":"48g","fatContent":"13g"},"recipeIngredient":["Caramel: 150g (3/4 cup) sugar","Caramel: 2 tbsp water","Pudding: 300g (about 6 cups) stale bread, torn into pieces (French bread or white bread)","Pudding: 750ml (3 cups) whole milk","Pudding: 4 large eggs","Pudding: 150g (3/4 cup) sugar","Pudding: 1 tsp vanilla extract","Pudding: Zest of 1 lemon","Pudding: 3 tbsp dulce de leche (for serving)"],"recipeInstructions":[{"@type":"HowToStep","position":1,"text":"Tear the stale bread into small pieces and place in a large bowl. Pour warm milk over the bread and let it soak for 30 minutes until completely soft."},{"@type":"HowToStep","position":2,"text":"Meanwhile, make the caramel: heat sugar and water in a saucepan over medium heat, swirling (don't stir) until it turns deep amber. Pour into a loaf pan or bundt mold, tilting to coat the bottom and sides. Let harden."},{"@type":"HowToStep","position":3,"text":"Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)."},{"@type":"HowToStep","position":4,"text":"Mash the soaked bread and milk together with a fork until you have a smooth, porridge-like consistency."},{"@type":"HowToStep","position":5,"text":"In a separate bowl, whisk eggs with sugar, vanilla, and lemon zest."},{"@type":"HowToStep","position":6,"text":"Combine the egg mixture with the bread mixture, stirring well until fully incorporated."},{"@type":"HowToStep","position":7,"text":"Pour into the caramel-lined mold. Place the mold in a larger baking dish and fill the outer dish with hot water halfway up the sides (baño María)."},{"@type":"HowToStep","position":8,"text":"Bake for 45-50 minutes until set and a knife inserted in the center comes out clean."},{"@type":"HowToStep","position":9,"text":"Let cool completely, then refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight."},{"@type":"HowToStep","position":10,"text":"To unmold, run a knife around the edges and invert onto a plate. The caramel will flow over the pudding."},{"@type":"HowToStep","position":11,"text":"Serve slices drizzled with dulce de leche."}]}0:{"buildId":"XJ7f5RvYDcX4yjbAXmNYG","rsc":["$","$1","c",{"children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-b from-orange-50 to-white","children":[["$","script",null,{"type":"application/ld+json","dangerouslySetInnerHTML":{"__html":"$2"}}],["$","div",null,{"className":"border-b bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-sm sticky top-0 z-40 print:hidden","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"max-w-5xl mx-auto px-4 py-4","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-center justify-between","children":"$L3"}]}]}],"$L4","$L5","$L6"]}],null,"$L7"]}],"loading":null,"isPartial":false}

f:["$","div",null,{"className":"lg:col-span-2 space-y-6","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-center gap-4 text-sm print:hidden","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-gray-500","children":"Jump to:"}],["$","a",null,{"href":"#instructions","className":"text-orange-600 hover:underline","children":"Instructions"}],["$","a",null,{"href":"#tips","className":"text-orange-600 hover:underline","children":"Tips"}],["$","a",null,{"href":"#history","className":"text-orange-600 hover:underline","children":"History"}]]}],["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card","className":"bg-card text-card-foreground flex flex-col gap-6 rounded-xl border py-6 shadow-sm print:shadow-none print:border-gray-300","id":"instructions","children":[["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-header","className":"@container/card-header grid auto-rows-min grid-rows-[auto_auto] items-start gap-2 px-6 has-data-[slot=card-action]:grid-cols-[1fr_auto] [.border-b]:pb-6","children":["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-title","className":"font-semibold text-xl","children":"Instructions"}]}],["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-content","className":"px-6","children":["$","ol",null,{"className":"space-y-6","children":[["$","li","0",{"className":"flex gap-4","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"flex-shrink-0 w-8 h-8 rounded-full bg-orange-100 text-orange-600 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-sm","children":1}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-700 leading-relaxed pt-1","children":"Tear the stale bread into small pieces and place in a large bowl. Leave bread out uncovered for a day or two."}]]}],["$","li","1",{"className":"flex items-start gap-3","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-amber-500 mt-1","children":"✦"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-700","children":"The water bath (baño María) is essential for even, gentle cooking. Without it, the edges will overcook while the center stays raw."}]]}],["$","li","2",{"className":"flex items-start gap-3","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-amber-500 mt-1","children":"✦"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-700","children":"Some families add raisins soaked in rum — a delicious addition if you like dried fruit."}]]}]]}]}]]}]
19:["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card","className":"bg-card text-card-foreground flex flex-col gap-6 rounded-xl border py-6 shadow-sm print:shadow-none print:border-gray-300","id":"history","children":[["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-header","className":"@container/card-header grid auto-rows-min grid-rows-[auto_auto] items-start gap-2 px-6 has-data-[slot=card-action]:grid-cols-[1fr_auto] [.border-b]:pb-6","children":["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-title","className":"font-semibold flex items-center gap-2 text-xl","children":[["$","svg",null,{"xmlns":"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg","width":24,"height":24,"viewBox":"0 0 24 24","fill":"none","stroke":"currentColor","strokeWidth":2,"strokeLinecap":"round","strokeLinejoin":"round","className":"lucide lucide-history w-5 h-5 text-orange-600","aria-hidden":"true","children":[["$","path","1357e3",{"d":"M3 12a9 9 0 1 0 9-9 9.75 9.75 0 0 0-6.74 2.74L3 8"}],["$","path","1xhq8a",{"d":"M3 3v5h5"}],["$","path","1fdv2h",{"d":"M12 7v5l4 2"}],"$undefined"]}],"The Story Behind the Dish"]}]}],["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-content","className":"px-6","children":["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-700 leading-relaxed","children":"Budín de pan is the quintessential Argentine thrift dessert, born from the tradition of never wasting food. Every household accumulated stale bread, and resourceful cooks turned it into this rich custard dessert. Italian and Spanish immigrants both had similar traditions, and the Argentine version merged them, adding the ever-present dulce de leche as a topping. It remains a staple of Sunday family lunches and neighborhood bakeries."}]}]]}]
1a:["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card","className":"bg-card text-card-foreground flex flex-col gap-6 rounded-xl border py-6 shadow-sm print:shadow-none print:border-gray-300","children":[["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-header","className":"@container/card-header grid auto-rows-min grid-rows-[auto_auto] items-start gap-2 px-6 has-data-[slot=card-action]:grid-cols-[1fr_auto] [.border-b]:pb-6 pb-3","children":["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-title","className":"font-semibold text-lg","children":"Storage & Leftovers"}]}],["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-content","className":"px-6 pt-0","children":["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-700","children":"Refrigerate covered for up to 4 days. Serve cold or at room temperature. Can be frozen for up to 2 months — thaw in the refrigerator overnight."}]}]]}]
